content.rendered:
Disclaimer

canonsetup-canon.com is a Third Party independent technical support provider and is not associated with the Canon or Canon Inc. manufacturer in any way. We offer dedicated and specialized tech support services for users of Canon Printers. Our team of experts provides technical assistance to help you in resolving troubles regarding the Setup, Operations, and Maintenance of Canon Printers. We are not liable for the defects and errors in Canon Printers.

All the information or content present on our website is purely for reference purposes. We do not guarantee the accuracy, probable results, or reliability of the material provided on our website or any linked site. The content appearing on our website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. We disclaim all liability in regard to any damage or loss of data/ profit arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on our website. Your use of our website is solely at your own risk and discretion.

Any defect or error in the printer or any product is not our liability. We regard ourselves as a third-party worker that provides technical assistance independently. The customers’ or users’ use of this website is solely at your own risk. Please note that as independent support, no insurance is given on the precision, expected outcome, or trustworthiness of the information given on our website or any linked site. All liabilities regarding any data impairment or the use of data for your business and personal interest are at your own risk.

TRADEMARKS:

All the registered trademarks, company names, product names, and brand names are the property of their respective owners, and canonsetup-canon.com disclaims any ownership in such third-party marks. The use of any third-party trademarks, logos, or brand names is for informational purposes only, and does not imply an endorsement by canonsetup-canon.com or vice versa or that such trademark owner has authorized canonsetup-canon.com to promote its products or services.

TERMS OF WARRANTY COVERAGE:

Most hardware and software products are covered under the manufacturer’s warranty during the initial period of use. If your product is under warranty the support services may be available for free at your product manufacturer’s official online or offline center. canonsetup-canon.com recommends that you contact the original supplier of the product in such circumstances.

CONTENT ON canonsetup-canon.com :

All content provided on or through the site, are provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis, except where expressly provided otherwise. canonsetup-canon.com is not responsible for third party Content provided on or through the Site and you bear all risks associated with the use of such third party Content, products, and services.
